name: The Wizard's Apprentice (Kosmo the Space Cat)
name_original: The Wizard's Apprentice (Kosmo the Space Cat)
description:
Tired of fighting, grind and saving the world?

Wizard's Apprentice is a cute adventure in a small but open world.

Your task is to prepare for the final exam and become a true wizard. But your teacher decides that instead of the final exam, you'll be taking part in a cooking competition!

You have to find the right recipe and collect all the ingredients for it. To do this, you'll have to complete quests to help the townsfolk, find secrets and uncover incredible mystery.

Some quests can be completed in different ways. Or you can simply sell a quest item to buy the right ingredient.

Each dish you present at the exam will lead to one of 15 different endings!

Your actions also affect the fate of the townsfolk.
